page.title: 09Inside Dartmoor Prison cont.
page.content: ...laundry and kitchen or help to clean the prison. In the evenings there are educational classes for the prisoners to attend if they wish or they can take up hobbies such as soft toy making, painting or making models with matchsticks. Every year there is an exhibition and sale of the prisoners' paintings and crafts in the village and money from the sale goes to charity. Each wing has its own T.V. and videos are shown at the week-ends. There is a gymnasium in the prison where the prisoners can play table tennis, five- a-side football, badminton or do gymnastics or weight training. They also exercise for one hour every day. The prison also has a chapel and on Sundays about 60 prisoners attend the morning service and 90 attend in the evening when they can play guitars.
